projects.name: ASCII Cube
description:
ASCII cube was our first failure. The intention was to create a 3d render of an ascii cube
that would rotate and zoom in an out, following commands from given arrow keys. Needless to say this was
overly ambitious for only 2 hours

projects.name: ASCII Paint
description:
ASCII Paint was the first 2 hour project, and one of our favorits for how silly it is.
all it does is take inputs with wasd and place a character in the terminal with space. It also comes with multiple
brushes that can change the way you paint. It was a very fun project to work on and holds a special place in out heart

projects.name: Chatroom
description:
This chat room will work on a good day, because we are poor we can't afford firebase and
 
can only read so much data from our server, this one allows you to send messeges back and forth with anyone else
that wants to access the webpage. You can clear the chat by typing clear in the box though

projects.name: Discord Bot
description:
This is a discord group created for our friends, during the covid-19 pandemic we got really
into watching B-movies, and wanted to make a bot for our discord that would help us pick them
this bot allows you to add movies to a list and pick them, you can also remove movies, pick a random one
or clear the whole list. It also has utility features like rolling a dice or generating a random number, or picture
our favorites though are the shame feature which will shame a random member, and the big command which makes any text
into big emojis

projects.name: Emoji Checkers
description:
I mean its basic checkers, but with a few exceptions. You can't multi-jump, and you are not forced to make
a move if you can we could have implimented them, but we ran out of time give it a try if you want 
there isn't a bot so bring a frind too

projects.name: Fish Tank
description:
Incrimental games our a guilty pleasure of ours so of course we had to make one
it's uhh not very good... 2 hours isn't really enough time to balance a game, and being our first project
in javascript it looks pretty ugly too, but it works so thats about as much as we could ask for.
Give it a try, and let us know if you can beat it...(you can btw it takes like 3 minutes).

projects.name: Weather Website
description: This one is probobly one of the most functional websites we have built. It tells you the weather
given that you allow location settings. It works by grabing your coordinates from a geolocation api, and then
it uses those to grab the local weather forcast from a government wheather registery, it isn't the prettiest
but it was our first website that didn't look half bad...

projects.name: Swarm Simulator
description:
Swarm simulator takes a bunch of pixals, and makes them swarm around your mouse.
It look's pretty cool, we highly recommend you check it out if you get the chance
 
Probobly the best looking project we have done.

projects.name: Cellular Automata
description:
This is a recreation of the famous game of life created by John Horton Conway
In this version there are starting colonies, and 2 seperate color factions that are
 
at war with each other. It's compleatly random, but we always root for red.
